articles.description: The former Sheffield Wednesday midfielder has not fully recovered from heel surgery. Lee is one of a number of Bolton players who will miss Saturday's League One clash at the University of Bolton Stadium.
articles.content: Kieran Lee has been ruled out of Bolton Wanderers League One clash against Sheffield Wednesday. The former Owls midfielder is still having some soreness in his heel following an operation to remove a… [+1966 chars]
